description:
The idea is simple: you sell your pre-loved stuff to other members who’ll love it again. They get the thrill of unboxing a great find, you get more space at home. It's look-good, do-good, feel-good, for everyone. 

Selling is easy and free
Snap photos of your item, describe it, and set your price. You keep 100% of what you earn.  
• Cash in on your pre-loved clothes, homeware and appliances, electronics, collectables, kids’ toys, and more. 
• Watch your earnings grow. Send your money straight to your bank account. 
• Buyers cover shipping costs. You get prepaid labels that make things simple. 

Shop new-again finds 				
Feel proud of your second-hand discoveries, from designer gems to great-value tech. 
• Fast finds, long-lasting love. There’s a Vinted category for almost everything, use filters to speed up shopping. 
• We’ve got your back. When you buy on Vinted, we cover you with Buyer Protection. For a small fee, you’ll get a refund if your item is lost, damaged in delivery, or significantly not as described. 
• Choose a shipping carrier and have your order sent to your home or a convenient pick-up point.  

Get added confidence
There are 2 verification services on Vinted to give you peace of mind when trading more expensive pieces. 
Item Verification for designer fashion
Have selected items checked for authenticity by our team of experts. 
Electronics Verification 
For certain tech items, get the functionality, condition, and authenticity verified. 
You’ll only receive items that pass the check, or get a refund. Opt to buy verification during checkout. 

There’s a diverse community of second-hand enthusiasts waiting to meet you. Chat with your fellow members, get updates, and manage your orders all in one place. 

Come join us
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@vinted 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/vinted
Find out more in our Help Centre: https://www.vinted.co.uk/help

Shop on Temu for exclusive offers. 

No matter what you're looking for, Temu has you covered, including fashion, home decor, handmade crafts, beauty & cosmetics, clothing, shoes, and more.

Download Temu today and enjoy incredible deals daily.

WIDE SELECTION
Discover thousands of new products and shops.

CONVENIENCE
Fast and secure checkout.
Free shipping & returns within 90 days.
*Other conditions may apply

Visit temu.com or follow us on:
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/temu/
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@temu 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/shoptemu
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/@temu

Shop brands you love:

- Shop big brands and local stores, and follow your faves
- Get notified about special offers, price drops, restocks, and new product drops
- Save items for later and organize things into collections (like “camping gear” or “ideas for dad”)
- Just so you know: brands don’t pay extra to sell on Shop, which means each time you buy, you’re helping out the business

Check out with one tap:

- Your payment info, shipping address, and shopping preferences all live in your secure Shop Pay wallet
- Just tap to check out (no more getting up to go find your card)
- Every shopping cart from every store is saved on Shop, so it’s all there when you’re ready to check out
- Just so you know: your info is safe with Shop, which meets strict PCI compliance standards

Track all your orders:

- See every order from every store you buy from
- Map exactly where each package is now
- Shop can even scan your email for new order info and collect it for you in the app (no more searching your inbox for updates) 

- - -

Have a question or just want to say hello? Contact us by visiting help.shop.app

Shop secure and worry free: Our servers meet strict PCI compliance standards for vaulting credit card info.

Powered by Shopify: Shop was created by the commerce platform trusted by millions of businesses worldwide.

developer: Lidl Digital International GmbH & Co. KG
description:
LIDL PLUS: Find Food Deals, Grocery Coupons and Shopping Rewards on the Products You Love! The service is aimed at customers who'd like to receive personalised information from Lidl Stiftung about Lidl Plus promotions, as well as offers, products and services from Lidl Companies and selected partners. We personalise this information based on your purchase and usage behaviour of the products and services of the Lidl Companies.

Incredible grocery discounts every time you shop with Lidl! ‘Straight in my basket!’ 

Download, register and save even more. Lidl Plus is our new rewards app, designed to give you discounts on the products you love. 

The service is aimed at customers who'd like to receive personalised information from Lidl Stiftung about Lidl Plus promotions, as well as offers, products and services from Lidl Companies and selected partners. We personalise this information based on your purchase and usage behaviour of the products and services of the Lidl Companies.

Available in Republic of Ireland, Northern Ireland, Great Britain and Malta. 

We’ll send you Lidl coupons based on the products that you love. Simply activate your coupons and scan in store to make incredible savings on your Lidl shopping. 

Every time you shop, you will also get the chance to win amazing prizes*. So what’s not to like? Check out the best things about the Lidl Plus loyalty app and how to use it.

HOW TO GET LIDL PLUS LOYALTY REWARDS:

 - Activate your coupons in the app and scan your digital Lidl Plus Card at the till to redeem and save money on your shop.
 - Scan your digital Lidl Plus Card at the till for the chance to win great prizes* on each store visit!
 -  Never lose a receipt again. You’ll get a purchase summary and a digital copy of your receipt with Lidl Plus.
 -  Never miss another offer. Browse through a digital version of our weekly leaflet in the app.

Plus many more exciting features!

We made this app to reward you for shopping at Lidl and to help you find deals on your favourite foods, drinks and household items. 

From amazing food coupons to saving money on your next shop – Lidl Plus is the app to download if you want to get the best food deals and shopping discounts. We’re always looking to help you enjoy quality products at great prices, so download our free loyalty app and register today and find food deals, shopping rewards and grocery coupons on the products you love.

*This feature is not available in all countries.

When joining the Lidl Plus program, you can allow tracking technology, which helps us to understand how you interact with the app. This includes what pages you visit, what coupons you view, and how long you spend on each page. This tracking allows Lidl Plus to improve the app and provide you with tailored communication, discounts and to participate in relevant surveys.

Data Protection Policy:
Great Britain: https://www.lidl.co.uk/c/lidl-plus-privacy-notice/s10023377?salesChannel=02
Republic of Ireland: https://www.lidl.ie/c/lidl-plus-data-protection/s10024073?salesChannel=02
Northern Ireland: https://www.lidl-ni.co.uk/c/lidl-plus-data-protection/s10028706?salesChannel=0
Malta: https://www.lidl.com.mt/c/privacy-policy-lidl-plus/s10017470?salesChannel=02
Slovenia: https://www.lidl.si/c/lidl-plus-varstvo-osebnih-podatkov/s10020643?salesChannel=02

Terms of use:
Great Britain: https://www.lidl.co.uk/c/lidl-plus-terms-of-use/s10025414?salesChannel=02
Republic of Ireland: https://www.lidl.ie/c/lidl-plus-terms-of-use/s10024080?salesChannel=02
Northern Ireland: https://www.lidl-ni.co.uk/c/lidl-plus-terms-of-use/s10032042?salesChannel=0
Malta: https://www.lidl.com.mt/c/terms-of-use-lidl-plus/s10017323?salesChannel=02
Slovenia: https://www.lidl.si/c/lidl-plus-splosni-pogoji-uporabe/s10020644?salesChannel=02

Get more power in your pocket with the new Tesco App, where online shopping and Clubcard are combined into one place. Shop straight from the app, receive coupons to use both online and in-store and even scan your Clubcard from your phone. It will make shopping online and in-store quicker by having everything you need in one easy to use the app. Choose from Home Delivery or Click+Collect and get your shopping in the way that suits you.

With our new app, you can now scan your Clubcard barcode directly from your phone when you shop in-store. Collect Clubcard points when you shop for groceries online and in-store. Spend your Clubcard Vouchers and Coupons straight from your app.

Shop online anytime, anywhere.
Do your online grocery shopping wherever it suits you, at home in front of the TV or while you are out and about.

Build your basket straight from your favourites.
We save your favourites, usual purchases, and previous orders to make shopping even quicker.

Never miss a deal.
With Clubcard in your app, all deals and Clubcard Prices are right there on your home screen. So, you'll always see the best offers on products you love.

Change your order when it suits you.
Forgotten something? You can add or remove items from your order and choose a different delivery or collection slot up until 11.45 pm the evening before it’s due.

Get helpful order updates.
We’ll send you reminders when your order is due, how long you have to make changes and more. Just opt-in to push notifications

Sign in quickly and securely.
Add fingerprint or face recognition to make signing in even quicker. And two-factor authentication via SMS adds extra account protection.

Help us get better.
We're always making updates and improvements based on your feedback.

FLEXIBLE WAYS TO PAY
Choose to pay in 3 interest-free instalments, pay the full amount, in 30 days or with financing.¹

¹ UK: Klarna’s Pay in 3/Pay in 30 days are unregulated credit agreements. Klarna Financing is regulated if it charges interest or lasts over 12 months. It is not regulated if it’s 0% interest and 12 months or less. Borrowing more than you can afford or paying late may negatively impact your financial status and ability to obtain credit. 18+, UK residents only. Klarna’s Regulated Financing has a representative APR of 21.9% (fixed).

¹ Ireland: Please shop responsibly. 18+ ROI residents only. Credit subject to status. APR 0%. Missed payments may incur a fee and affect your ability to use Klarna in the future. T&Cs apply. https://www.klarna.com/ie/terms-and-conditions/. 

SHOP ANYWHERE IN THE KLARNA APP
Access Klarna's flexible payment options anywhere - shop at your favorite stores and split your purchase with the payment plan that suits you.

UP TO 10% CASHBACK
Shop in the app and earn up to 10% cashback. Get cashback at hundreds of stores in the app.²

² Klarna Cashback Rewards are awarded as points which can be redeemed for a credit to your Klarna Balance and other benefits. Earn cashback on Klarna App purchases. Klarna balance account required. Cashback issuance depends on store approval and may be affected by cookie settings, combining offers, product exclusions, or other factors beyond our control. Klarna may get a commission. Limitations, terms and conditions apply.

SHOP WITH THE KLARNA CARD
Pay with Klarna anywhere Visa is accepted. Pay now or pay later with the card. No fees and no credit impact to apply.³ 

³ UK & Ireland: A paid Klarna Membership is required for a physical card. Klarna Membership offered for a monthly fee. Cancel any time in the Klarna app. Exclusions, conditions, and limitations apply to membership benefits like Klarna Membership cashback. Klarna Membership Terms apply.

UNLOCK YOUR KLARNA BALANCE
Add money to your balance and pay flexibly, anywhere you shop. Get instant refunds, earn cashback at eligible stores, and convert your cashback as a credit in your balance.⁴

⁴ Ireland: Account covered by the Swedish deposit guarantee scheme. Max. compensation per customer: SEK 1,050,000. National Debt Office makes compensation available within 7 business days from the date a right to compensation accrues. Read more here.

USE KLARNA WITH APPLE PAY
Split the cost with Klarna on Apple Pay, available in-store and online.

FIND THE BEST PRICE, EVERY TIME
Search for any product and instantly compare prices across stores.

HASSLE-FREE RETURNS
Need to send something back? Report a return right in the app. We’ll pause your purchase so you don’t have to pay in the meantime.

TRACK ALL YOUR DELIVERIES
Get real-time updates, arrival times, and pickup photos—right in the Klarna app.

24/7 CUSTOMER SERVICE
Use our chat in the Klarna app for 24/7 support.

Comprehensive
Quickly search, get product details, read reviews and purchase millions of products available from Amazon.co.uk, Amazon.com.be and other merchants.

Convenient
Sign in with your existing Amazon account to access your basket, payment and shipping options. No need to create a new account to manage your 1-Click settings and wish lists, track your orders and use your Prime membership benefits. Shop just as you do on the web.
 
Fast
Compare prices and check availability instantly by scanning a barcode, snapping a picture or typing your search. 
 
Secure
All purchases are routed through Amazon's secure servers.
 
Universal
Shop Amazon.co.uk, Amazon.de, Amazon.es, Amazon.fr, Amazon.com, Amazon.it, Amazon.cn, Amazon.co.jp or Amazon.com.be from a single app.

By using this app, you agree to Amazon’s Conditions of Use (www.amazon.co.uk/conditionsofuse or www.amazon.com.be/conditionsofuse). Please see our Privacy Notice (www.amazon.co.uk/privacynotice or www.amazon.com.be/privacynotice), our Cookies Notice (www.amazon.co.uk/cookies or www.amazon.com.be/cookies) and our Interest-Based Ads Notice (www.amazon.co.uk/interestbasedads or ou www.amazon.com.be/interestbasedads).

If your device supports TrueDepth technology, the app will use your device camera to detect your facial movements only while using certain features such as virtually try-on products like sunglasses. All information processed using this technology remains on your device and is not otherwise stored, processed or shared by Amazon.

Better value at your fingertips

 Get a €5 off €25 welcome voucher to spend on your grocery shop when you download our app. Use it in-store or on your home delivery order with Dunnes Stores Express. (Ts & Cs apply)

With the Dunnes Stores App, you can:

   •   Store your vouchers, VALUEclub Card and Gift Cards, all in one place
   •   Order your grocery shop for home delivery in as little as 1 hour or choose a delivery slot that suits you with Dunnes Stores Express powered by buymie
   •   See our latest grocery offers
   •   See what’s new in fashion and home

 APP FEATURES

Grocery Delivery with Dunnes Stores Express  

You can now order your grocery shop from the app for home delivery in Dublin, Cork, Limerick and Galway with Dunnes Stores Express. From offers on your favourite brands to big savings on our own label range, order your big trolley shop or small basket shop for delivery in as little as 1 hour or choose a delivery slot that suits you.

Grocery Delivery at dunnesstoresgrocery.com
 
Dunnes Stores delivery is available across Ireland. Tap through to our site from the app to book a delivery slot that suits you.
	
Tap to Save at The Till

Tap to Save at The Till to reveal barcodes for:

   •   Your VALUEclub card
   •   Your VALUEclub Reward vouchers
   •   Your Shop & Save vouchers e.g. €10 off €50 
   •   Your Dunnes Stores Gift Cards
   •   Exclusive app-only promotional vouchers

Swipe across to scan each barcode at the till for better value in-store. 

Digital VALUEclub Card  

VALUEclub is our way of thanking you every time you shop. Earn 1 point for every €1 you spend. 100 points are worth €1 in VALUEclub money vouchers.

Your VALUEclub card is available in the app. Create a Dunnes Stores VALUEclub account in the app or add your existing VALUEclub card. Then, just scan your phone at the till when you shop so that the VALUEclub points and vouchers you’ve earned appear in the app. 
For added convenience, you can even sign in on multiple devices.

Digital Vouchers  

When you scan your digital VALUEclub card at the till, a digital version of the Shop & Save vouchers you earn will appear automatically in your app. To use your vouchers in-store, tap on a voucher to reveal the barcode and scan it at the till. 

The app also highlights vouchers that are about to expire and a handy voucher history section has a record of all your earned, spent, and expired vouchers over the past 30 days.

  Digital Gift Cards 

To add any Dunnes Stores Gift Card to your app, tap the Wallet menu and scan or add the card details. These will be available alongside your VALUEclub Card and reward vouchers and Shop & Save vouchers in the Wallet. You can also purchase new Gift Cards directly from the app.

To use a Gift Card in-store, simply tap on your Wallet, swipe across, and your Gift Card barcode will be visible to scan when at the till. 

See Offers on Fresh Food and Your Favourite Brands

  The app is automatically updated with our latest offers so you can add to cart or save for later in your favourites so you never miss out on better value.   

Browse ‘New In’ 

See the latest drops in fashion and homeware at dunnesstores.com, including newness from our exclusive designers. When something catches your eye, simply tap right through to our online store and shop.   

Find your Nearest Store

  Search for stores in a specific area or discover the stores closest to your current location on the app. You’ll find details about store services and opening times for each store making shopping with us even easier.  

Follow us on social: @dunnesstores

The Real Rewards app is the official mobile app for the SuperValu loyalty programme. Once you download the app, your Real Rewards card will unlock amazing savings each week. As a Real Rewards member, you have access to money off vouchers every Thursday, extra savings with our weekly coupons, exclusive Real Rewards prices, supreme quality collector campaigns and a chance to win amazing prizes in our monthly Scan to Win draw. You can now activate your weekly vouchers and coupons and add them directly to your card. Once they’ve been activated, you’ll be able to view them in the My Card section at the top right-hand corner of your screen. This will save you valuable time at the till! Make sure to scan your Real Rewards app or card every time you shop in-store or online to save on your weekly shop.

Motion. Movement. Always Forever Forward. Christmas is gonna be a big one. You with us? We’re kicking off this Festive season right. With the biggest brands, and all the latest drops. Right here on the JD app.

All things JD, all in one place. Download the app. Track your orders. Play JD Festive Jump. And be the first to know about app-exclusive offers and when the Black Friday and Christmas Sales land. Notifications: on.

Big brands
Nike. adidas. The North Face. New Balance. And so many more. We’re shoutin the biggest brands this season. Every motive, every style. Lowkey chills, stepping out, gym sessions. We’ve got you covered with clothing, trainers and accessories from your faves.

Premium picks from EA7 Emporio Armani and Calvin Klein? Sorted. JD exclusives like McKenzie or Unlike Humans? Got em. See all these and loads more.

Crep check
Fresh on foot. Always. From the latest launches to essential picks, your rotation’s gonna be popping off. Air Max 95 to Air Force 1. Samba to Climacool. If it’s creps you’re copping, you already know we’re the one.
With colder days coming, we’re going big on boots. Timberland to Dr Martens, bag a fresh pair of boots for autumn. Keeping it chilled when the weather hits? Don’t blame you. We’ve got kicks for kicking back in from Crocs, UGG, and loads more.

Big coat weather
Feeling the chill? Shop stacks of new layers. Get heavy-duty hitters with padded coats from The North Face, Berhgaus and Columbia. 
Looking for something lighter? Montirex, Trailberg and Napapijri deliver on jackets. Stay dry. Feel fresh. 

Christmas Giftin'
Your next gifting haul’s gonna be stacked with new season style. T-shirts to tracksuits. Hoodies and joggers. Men’s, women’s, and kids’. Our clothing collection’s packed with essential fits. 

Sportswear
Got goals? We’re gonna help you get there. Gym class. Run club. Weight session. Wherever you’re moving, we’re moving with you. Cop workout essentials from champion names like On, HOKA, Under Armour and more. 

And when you’re hitting that pitch, we’ve got replica kits from the biggest clubs to get you prepped for matchdays. Pick up the pace with football boots from Nike, adidas and PUMA. As well as all the training gear you need to match that pro energy.

JD STATUS
The ultimate loyalty app. Become a JD STATUS member and earn rewards with every shop. And it’s free. Get 10% JD Cash on your first JD STATUS cop, and earn 1x JD Cash every time. 

We’re talking member-exclusive deals, boosted JD Cash, and competitions you don’t wanna miss. Trust.

Pay your way
Secured the bag? Now choose how you pay. Apple Pay, Google Pay and PayPal make it mega easy. Or Klarna, Clearpay and Laybuy take the stress away. 

Make it yours
Signature style. Made just for you. Customise your cop with personalised designs. Caps, bags, football shirts and football boots. Make it your own with personalisation in the app.

Kids:
A selection for garments, accessories and shoes for:

-	Boy: 6–⁠14 years
-	Baby girl: 9 months - 6 years
-	Baby boy: 9 months - 6 years
-	Newborn: 0-12 months
	
In addition, Zara's children's collection includes its Edited/customisable section, a selection of customisable clothing and accessories that is updated weekly. 


In addition to our permanent collections, with our Zara App you can find all our special launches, our beauty category and our lingerie line. 

Other utilities of the Zara App are:  
-	Favourites: Use your favourites list to save all the clothes and accessories you like.
-	Easy, intuitive and fast tracking of orders and returns. Track your order in each part of the process. 
-	Find your nearest Zara store. 
-	Activate notifications and receive information about new arrivals, launchings, special collections... 


Store mode 
-	Use your application in ""store mode"" when you are shopping in any of our stores and use all its features to improve your experience. 


Zara QR:
Use your QR on the Zara App for: 
-	Having associated all of your purchases online and at physical stores. At a physical store, identify yourself at the till with your Zara QR code and request an e-receipt.
-	In-store returns for both online and in-store purchases.
-	Collect all of your online orders at a physical store.

Everything you love, now at your fingertips!

SHEIN is an affordable online shopping platform offering rich items and trendy goods. Discovering pretty items, trying new things and sharing with others,  SHEIN is dedicated to meet all your needs in life and works as your one-stop shopping destination! We take pride in satisfying our customers and bringing them the best shopping experience.

Inspire yourself with SHEIN right now!

Save you more

- Free limited-time delivery and free returns within 30 Days（*conditions apply）
- Daily flash sales on many items 

Wide selections
- Fun, easy shopping with wide selections

Considerate services

- 24/7 Customer Service and Live Chat available

Contact us:
Facebook:  https://www.facebook.com/SHEINOFFICIAL/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/sheinofficial/

The app needs the following access permissions when it is running on your device:

-	Optional permission(s):

o	Notification: it will allow us to send push notifications to your device.

o	Camera: the camera function is required when you need to capture photos and videos and upload them to the app.

o	Photo and video: it will enable you to upload photos and videos from your device to the app.

o	Location: where the relevant service is available, it enables location based services on your device. 
(This is not used in Korea.)

o	Calendar: it enables you to sync the SHEIN LIVE events to your device calendar. 

o	Microphone: when you try to capture videos using Camera function, the app will also need the microphone access permission to capture the voice. 

※ Even if you do not grant optional access permissions, you can still use SHEIN service, except for the functions related to those permissions.

Shop thousands of high-quality sportswear, workout clothes, and cutting-edge sports equipment for kids and adults at unbeatable prices, all from the palm of your hand. Our collection caters to everyone, whether you consider yourself to besemi-pro, a casual participant, or a complete beginner. Discover world-renowned brands such as Adidas, Nike, ASICS, Timberland, Puma, and more.

Download the Decathlon Shopping App now for exclusive offers, browse our vast product range, and enjoy a smooth, secure checkout. You can also earn an extra 2000 membership points worth £3 on your next purchase on our App as a Decathlon member. With Decathlon, you get tailored push notifications, ensuring you only hear about products and promotions you care about. Shop comfortably from home, review your purchase history, and enhance your in-store experience with our extensive product catalogue and quick barcode scans.

Full Catalogue Access -Find clothes, accessories and equipment for 70 sports and thousands of product lines.

 Loyalty Program - Collect points with your Decathlon account for discounts on purchases.

 Exclusive offers - Unlock App-only discounts and be the first to get incredible deals with early access.

 Personalised Sports Experience - Discover tailored picks for your favourite sports: get ready to play!

 Push Notifications - Stay updated on product launches and exclusive offers.

 Students discount up to 10% off.

 Wish List - Don’t lose track of the items you love. Save items for later with ease.

Speedy & Secure Checkout - Seamless ordering process usingprocess withusing your preferred payment method.

 Online Receipts - Hassle-free returns and exchanges. Add physical receipts to your account for convenience.

Mobile In-store Guide - Unlock extra product information and reviews with a quick scan.

Share items - Want to quickly share a product link with others?? You can now easily send your top picks to friends and family .

  ℹ Store Info: - Real-time stock updates, events, and store details.

Our in-house brands like Quechua, Van Rysel, and Kiprun are crafted with expertise, offering you products with years of knowledge and innovation.

With the Decathlon shopping app, we guarantee: :
365 Days Return Policy (including warranty)
Product Rentals from £20 a day
Free Bike Safety Check (for purchases within the first 3 months)
Free In-store Pickup
Flexible Payments (Klarna, Paypal, Gift Cards, etc.)
Become a member and enjoy high-performance design and quality at the best price, with expert advice accessible anytime and anywhere.We're more than products; we're a lifestyle. Embrace health and fitness with our Decathlon Coach app and Kiprun Pacer app, offering free, customised training programs for all fitness and running levels.
Download the Decathlon Shopping App today for an unmatched shopping experience, unique products, and easy browsing and checkout.

*T&Cs apply.

WELCOME TO JD STATUS
Looking for rewards?! JD Sports is bringing you the ultimate loyalty app, which rewards you every time you shop*! Earn JD Cash when you bag the biggest brands in the game, including Nike, adidas and loads more. As a member, the app will be home to your JD STATUS QR code that you can scan at the till in-store to earn JD Cash! Or use the mobile number attached to your JD STATUS account when you shop on the JD Sports app or website to earn when you shop online. Build up the balance in your wallet and use your JD Cash to save on future in-store purchases.

EARN 10% JD CASH WHEN YOU SIGN UP  
JD STATUS members start earning from the first time they shop! Once you’ve signed up to JD STATUS for free in the app, you’ll unlock 10% JD Cash as your first reward. The first time you make a purchase, you’ll bag 10% of the value back in your balance as JD Cash, instead of the usual 1%. It’s our way of saying thanks! 

GET 1% JD CASH ON ALL PURCHASES 
We’ll reward you every time you shop! Each time you make a purchase at a participating JD store or online, you’ll earn 1% JD Cash, which all adds up! Keep an eye out for special offers and boosted rates where you can bank even more to boost your wallet’s balance. 

BOOSTED JD CASH DAYS   
Build the balance in your JD STATUS Wallet even quicker with special offers – exclusively available to JD STATUS members! These limited-time deals mean a boosted JD Cash rate, so you can bank even more when you’re shopping your favourite brands at JD. Make sure your app notifications are switched on so you’re in the loop each time new boosts drop! 

STUDENTS GET MORE 
Verify as a student in the JD STATUS app and you'll earn at least 5% JD Cash on every purchase you make online or in-store! Plus, watch out for special boosts and bonuses, exclusively for our student members.

YOUR PERSONAL JD STATUS WALLET  
The JD STATUS app is home to your JD STATUS Wallet. You don’t need to worry about carrying a loyalty card around with you, as you’ve got access to your rewards 24/7 right here on the app. From checking your balance to redeeming your JD Cash in-store, your rewards are always at your fingertips! 

Making it extra easy for you, you can also add your JD STATUS QR code to your Apple Wallet for quick access – even if you’ve no internet connection!  

Ready to access JD STATUS benefits? Join JD STATUS today and start earning every time you shop at JD Sports! 

*Available in JD Sports stores across the UK, Republic of Ireland and France. UK and French users can also earn JD Cash when they shop online (coming soon to Ireland!).

THE BROWN THOMAS SHOPPING EXPERIENCE NOW IN THE PALM OF YOUR HAND

The Brown Thomas shopping app brings you closer than ever to Ireland’s most-loved luxury department store. Our online shopping app allows you to browse and shop the latest fashion, bags, shoes, beauty, home and more.

CHECK STOCK: Quickly check if the product you love is available online or in any of our stores nationwide with one tap.

ENCORE LOYALTY: Encore loyalty rewards you for every online and in-store purchase you make. Collect, view and redeem your loyalty points all in our app. Making the trip to store? Access your loyalty card to collect points at the till – even without mobile network or Wi-Fi.

ORDER UPDATES: With the Brown Thomas Shopping App, you can get immediate updates on the status of your orders in your account. Enable push notifications to get an update whenever your order ships.

PUSH NOTIFICATIONS: Hear it here first! Stay up to date with the latest arrivals, exclusive launches and sale events when you turn on push notifications.

DELIVERY METHODS: Shop your favourite products online and take advantage of all our delivery methods right here in the app. In a hurry? Choose from Same Day, Nominated Day or Premium Express, or you can Click and Collect you order from any Brown Thomas or Arnotts store.

GIFTING DESTINATION: Make your order that bit more special with options for gift wrap on eligible items. Can’t decide what to buy? Purchase a Brown Thomas Gift Card in the app for redemption anywhere in-app, online or in-store.

STORE RECEIPTS: Never lose a receipt again; you can find all your store receipts and online orders easily in your account. Each one has a barcode that can be scanned at any of our tills.

WISHLIST: Save all of your favourite fashion, beauty and home products to your Wishlist and manage them from the Brown Thomas App or online.

Live your best sporting life with the adidas app. Discover an online shopping experience bringing you the latest sports clothing, trainers, and accessories from the brand with the 3-Stripes. Conveniently find the shoes and apparel fit for any sport or training program by searching in the adidas app. Join adiClub today and explore content, rewards, and online shopping deals for your favourite adidas sportswear.

adidas is your one-stop clothing and shoe store for trainers, football boots, running shoes, and sports clothes for all ages. Enhance your online shopping experience with exclusive access to the latest sports shoe drops and the most up-to-date sportswear releases, delivered straight to your fingertips.

Convenient online shopping for your favourite adidas apparel, shoes, and accessories is just a tap away. Find your favourite football boots, trainers, tracksuits, running shoes, and sports clothing with our robust search functionality and discover the styles you love. Filter by size, colour, price, sport, and more. Complete the simple and secure checkout process and your products will be on their way. adidas brings the ultimate sportswear and sneakers app to the palm of your hand.

Get more than just a clothing and shoe store. With adiClub, you get exclusive membership benefits. Earn points on purchases, access limited edition drops, and invitations to special events. Get access to exclusive celebrity collaborations with global superstars, from Lionel Messi to Kylie Jenner. Enjoy curated content, sportswear tips, and sporting inspiration all when you join adiClub.

Download adidas to enjoy online shopping with your favourite sports clothing, shoe drops, and exclusive content. All in or nothing – enhance your active lifestyle with adidas today.

THE ULTIMATE SPORTS CLOTHING & SHOE SHOP
- Trainers, sportswear, running shoes, football boots, and much more – adidas has you covered
- Access your favourite lifestyle fits with the adidas clothing and sneakers app
- Tracksuits, classic shoes, and more. Shop timeless adidas styles

ONLINE SHOPPING - MADE CONVENIENT
- adidas is the clothing and shoe store that brings you the tools to enhance your online shopping experience
- Browse and search the styles you love with helpful filters
- Seamlessly build your next outfit and check out in just a few taps

JOIN ADICLUB
- Earn points with adidas. Get rewarded for shopping, completing your profile, and leaving reviews.
- Use your points for exclusive discounts for online shopping deals on your favourite collections
- Get invited to special events and even vote on members-only adidas products
- Access exclusive content and limited edition drops with your adiClub membership

MORE THAN JUST SHOPPING
- Enjoy curated content covering your favourite apparel, shoes, and sports

All sports. All passions. All in. Download the adidas app today for an exclusive portal into unmatched online shopping and sportswear experiences.

The Nike App is your personal guide to all things Nike. ​​Become a Member ​​​and​​ get​​ exclusive ​access ​to ​the latest from Nike and Jordan. Shop innovative sport styles, curated clothing collections, and trending trainers. Unlock ​​Member Rewards, personalised ​​style advice, and easy shipping and returns, all in one seamless shopping app.

SHOP BETTER AS A MEMBER
Shop shoes, gear, sportswear, and streetwear. Kids’, women’s, or men’s clothing– check out the latest trainers and sport essentials from Nike and Jordan.
• Member Profile: View Activity, orders, and purchase history. Buy sportswear, sneakers, and accessories with the Nike online shopping app.
• Shopping App with Member Rewards: Celebrate big moments like your birthday & Member anniversary.
• Shop Exclusive Products: Shopping is better as a Member. Unlock exclusive sportswear and trainers from Jordan. Plus, get first dibs on new, upcoming, and seasonal releases dropping weekly. Shop Jordan, Air Max Dn8, P-6000, Nike Mercurial Football Boots, Vomero 18, and more.
• Jordan Mode: Shop the latest in Jordan clothing and sneakers, plus unlock exclusive content available only in Jordan Mode. Explore basketball shoes, seasonal women’s and men’s clothing collections, and sneaker releases from Jordan.
• Nike by You: Shop and customise iconic Nike shoes with curated colour palettes and premium materials that match your style.

SERVICES THAT CONNECT & GUIDE YOU
Finding your favourite clothing and sports essentials is easier with the Nike shopping app. Be the first to score the latest sneakers when you turn on notifications. Chat one-on-one with a Nike Expert for style advice on our sneakers and clothing.
• Notifications: Never miss a sneaker drop. Jordan drops, the latest apparel, athlete collaborations, events, and more are yours to discover when you turn on push notifications.
• Training & Coaching for all: Expert advice delivered by Nike athletes, coaches, and personal trainers. Receive training tips with your Nike community from wherever you are.
• Nike Experts: Get sport and style advice from our Nike experts. Chat in real-time for guidance on all things Nike and Jordan.
• Exclusive Nike Experiences: Find Member-only events in your city and attend IRL or online. Join your Nike community.
• Shop Online with Athlete Guidance: Get exclusive access to expert advice, personalised shopping recommendations, and Member-only perks.

STORIES THAT INSPIRE & INFORM YOU
Nike is more than a shopping app. Find in-depth stories spanning across sport and culture, delivered daily. Follow your favourite athletes, sports teams, and products to get the most from the Nike App.
• Member Home: Explore new, curated Nike stories, refreshed daily.
• Clothing Trends & Trainers: Find new ways to wear your favourite Nike styles, accessories, and footwear.
• Sportswear Collections: Trainers, football boots, accessories, sportswear, or workout clothing– learn what gear empowers the top Nike athletes.

Discover a shopping app with Member benefits and explore the latest from Nike and Jordan. Unlock exclusive apparel, style recommendations, in-person experiences, and the newest sneaker releases.

Download today and experience shopping as a Nike Member.

Unlock the key to Village life with the Kildare Village app and discover more than 100 boutiques of fashion, luxury and lifestyle brands at your fingertips, as well as the insider track on the latest Village news and updates. 

With the interactive Village map, you’ll have everything you need to navigate our landscaped avenues with ease. You can even select your favourite boutiques to access the details you need with a quick tap.  

If you’re a Kildare Village member, use the app to sign in to your profile and track your exclusive membership benefits at the touch of a button. If you haven’t yet registered, become a member through the app to be the first to know about new collections and enjoy access to our Private Sale, as well as receiving a birthday surprise and earning a host of tailored benefits. 

Scan your membership QR code in participating boutiques and restaurants across The Bicester Collection in Europe and earn a star for every €1 you spend. The more stars you earn, the more surprises you unlock and the quicker you take your shopping experience to the next level. Plus, you can add your membership QR code to your smart wallet to make earning stars even easier.  

Enjoy curated rewards, tailored to your individual preferences, from the moment you sign up. Don’t forget to update your profile to unlock special surprises and scan your membership QR code every time you shop to see your benefits grow.

Black Friday starts here — score huge deals on the AliExpress app right now. AliExpress brings millions of items across fashion, electronics, home, beauty and more, all in one easy app so you can grab Black Friday discounts, flash sales and app-only coupons.

Find top brands, unique finds and everyday essentials at great prices. Read honest buyer reviews, compare sellers, and use smart search and filters to find exactly what you want. With AliExpress you get personalized recommendations, saved wishlists, price-drop alerts and curated collections tailored to your tastes.

We make shopping safe and simple. AliExpress protects your purchase with secure payments, buyer protection and easy returns. Track orders in real time, get delivery updates, and choose fast shipping options when you need items quickly. Chat with sellers or our support team right from the app.

Don’t miss limited-time Black Friday deals, exclusive app offers and flash events — AliExpress updates promotions constantly so you can save more. Whether you’re hunting for gifts, seasonal styles, or must-have gadgets, AliExpress puts endless choice and value in your pocket.

Download the AliExpress app today, join millions of shoppers, and enjoy worry-free shopping during Black Friday and all year round. Great finds and huge savings are just a tap away on AliExpress.

developer: Hangzhou Alibaba International Information Technology Co., Ltd.
description:
What is Alibaba.com?
Alibaba.com is one of the world’s leading B2B ecommerce marketplaces. Our app allows you to source products from global suppliers, all from the convenience of your mobile device.

Purchase with confidence
Our Trade Assurance service protects your orders and payments on the platform, letting you purchase securely and conveniently with extended support.

Customizable products
Meet suppliers with years of customization and order fulfillment experience for sellers on Amazon, eBay, Wish, Etsy, Mercari, Lazada, and more.

Easy sourcing
Discover millions of ready-to-ship products in every industry category. Tell suppliers what you need and get quotes quickly with Request for Quotation services.

Fast shipping
Alibaba.com partners with major freight forwarders to provide land, sea, and air shipping solutions with on-time delivery services, end-to-end tracking, and competitive prices.

Livestreams and factory tours
Interact with manufacturers in real-time via product demos and tours of manufacturing facilities, providing insight and oversight on how your products are made.

Popular categories and trade shows
Source a wide range of popular items – from trending consumer goods to raw materials – and join our annual trade shows for niche product highlights and discounts.

Quality control
Choose Alibaba.com Production Monitoring and Inspection Services to reduce production delay and quality risks.

Discounts and promotions
Unlock new discounts and promotions from featured manufacturers and suppliers.

Stay updated
Use the Alibaba.com app to stay up to date on new products and promotions from your favorite suppliers.

Language and currency support
Alibaba.com supports 16 languages and 140 local currencies. Use our real-time translator to communicate with sellers in your mother tongue.

The IKEA mobile app is where your inspiration comes to life. Find that cute armchair you saw at your friend’s place or look through thousands of products and ideas just for you - to make your space truly your own.

Whether you’re looking to buy online or in-store, the IKEA app is your perfect shopping companion.

Scan the products while you walk through the store  - and skip the checkout line.

Are you planning a big project or small home improvements? Save and organise your favourites in lists for later. They are ready when you are!

Found the perfect IKEA furniture or home decoration? Let us do the heavy lifting. Order home delivery and be informed every step of the way, by tracking your order easily in the app.

The IKEA app is also a convenient home for your IKEA Family benefits. Access your IKEA Family card quickly and find all your past receipts conveniently in one location.

IKEA values your data privacy and believes in ethical use of customer data. That’s why you’re in control of all your data at all times.

The hottest brands, the latest trends: find them all here. Enjoy an amazing shopping experience at home or on the go with the upgraded Next iOS app.

Our app uses cookies and similar technologies to enhance your shopping experience. If you would like to change your cookie preferences, please shop using the mobile or desktop version of the https://www.next.co.uk/ website.

Whether you’re shopping schoolwear for the new term, hunting for the perfect outfit for a special occasion or deciding how to switch up your living room, there’s something for everyone. And with 1000s of products across fashion, home and beauty. We truly mean it. 

THE ULTIMATE STYLE DESTINATION 
In a hurry? From fit to colour, occasion to brand, use our innovative search filters to find your perfect fit in a flash, then place your order in a few simple clicks. And if you’re not 100% sure, simply add your item to your Favourites to save it for later. We’re just as passionate about style as you are, so expect plenty of recommendations along the way for you to peruse. 

PUSH NOTIFICATIONS
Be the very first to know about new brand arrivals, upcoming sales, limited-time offers and items now back in stock with push notifications directly to your mobile device. 

TRACK EVERY ORDER 
Our Order Tracking function will make sure you know where your order is from the moment it leaves our warehouse to the second it’s delivered to your local store or direct to your front door, with detailed information on what you’ll be expecting, and when. 

FAVOURITES
Save your favourites at the click of a button – and all in one place – with our one-tap heart feature. Keep track of your saved styles, add or remove them from your list, and check if your size is in stock.

ORDER AND PAY, YOUR WAY (24.9% Representative APR Variable.)
Place an order and spread the cost with your Nextpay Credit Account via the Next app, then manage your balance, make payments and view statements wherever (and whenever) you want. If you’re in one of our stores, just scan your digital card to pay for your shopping with Nextpay.* 

Credit subject to status. *An in-app nextpay card to shop in-store is only available to customers once a first statement has been issued and a subsequent payment has been made.

We want to hear from you 
Read our product ratings and reviews from 1000s of other customers, and let us know where we can improve by reviewing the app. Our customers are the heart of everything we do, so we really appreciate your feedback.

*Some features in this section and the app previews are only available in the UK app. This includes Next Pay.

Welcome to the Universe of Special.
 
Shop Etsy—your global marketplace for original items made, handpicked, and designed by real people for all budgets. Explore everything from vintage treasures and trending style pieces to personalised jewellery and custom home decor. Get offers and deals on one-of-a-kind items from 800,000+ local shops in the UK, chat with Etsy sellers, track your orders, and more.
 
Shopping for holiday gifts or decorating for winter? No matter what you’re looking for, Etsy has the pieces that speak to you. Download today and discover original gifts and seasonal treasures from our community of sellers.
 
Shop the Etsy app.
 
App Marketplace Features
 
Global Marketplace: Buy Global, Support Local
• Shop over 15+ categories of original items from all over the world—from handmade furniture to vintage clothing.
• Favourite shops, save items, and organise your pieces in collections for future inspiration.
• Buy unique finds from trusted tastemakers, including Martha Stewart, Naomi Osaka, and more.
• Explore the latest trends and get inspired with the fall and winter trend guide, curated by our marketplace insights and experts.
 
Gift Special: Gifting with Etsy
• Create a gift list of your favourite items and save special occasions for helpful reminders.
• Shopping last minute? Make every gift special with custom gift teasers that give people a sneak peek at their present. Or, send a gift card with a personalised touch!
• Personalise style essentials, jewellery, and decor to make your gifts one-of-a-kind.
 
Save More: Offers & Deals
• Stay updated on offers and deals from small shops with push notifications.
• Buy curated selections of items on sale from Etsy sellers you love.
• Shop thrift finds and keep fashion circular, with vintage steals from small shops.
 
 
Shopping with Ease: Track, Chat & Buy
• Chat with Etsy sellers, ask questions, and stay in-the-know on your order status.
• Read customer reviews for small shops that speak to you.
• Order up and track shipments easily from the app, with customisable notifications.
• Purchase safely with secure payments, including credit/debit, Etsy gift cards, Paypal, Klarna, and quick purchases with Apple Pay.  
 
Unique Finds for All: Home, Style & More
• Furniture, home goods and decor: Style your space or give the perfect housewarming gift with pieces like handmade glassware sets or a custom dining table.
• Original art and collectibles: Explore current trends and vintage finds from around the world, like Turkish pottery and Portuguese ceramics.
• Clothes, jewellery and accessories: Shop vintage designer clothing and handmade accessories to elevate your personal wardrobe.
• DIY ideas: Get all the supplies and craft kits you need to throw a themed party or learn a new hobby.
 
Enjoy shopping with a personalised touch. Join a global marketplace and shop furniture, style essentials, art decor, and more for every occasion with the Etsy app. Download today.
 
*Etsy does not evaluate vintage items’ condition and authenticity.

Tap in to our fashion feed, anytime, anywhere, and all in one spot — the H&M app. 
Get instant updates, track your orders, use your own photos to find similar items in stock, and get inspired by our users all over the world! 

Imagine yourself browsing our feed and experiencing it live all at the same time.
Sounds exciting? Keep reading!

What if you found an item in our app and wanted you to know if it’s available in any of our stores? We have the answer to that — use our FIND IN STORE feature! This feature will show you all available sizes and colours and where we currently have them in stock.

Our app also comes handy when you’re already inside one of our stores.
Let’s say you can’t find your size or would like to know if an item is available in more sizes and colours? Scan the price tag — our SCAN & FIND feature will let you know!

Seen something you like and got inspired by? VISUAL SEARCH lets you explore what we have to offer by using your own photos or screen shots. It recognizes patterns, colors, styles, and gives you a list of matching or similar items in stock.

Save the items you love the most in your own list of favourites — just tap the HEART ICON. 

Turn the H&M app into your own shopping tool — activate IN-STORE MODE when you visit one of our stores. See which of your favourite-marked items are available in the store you’re in, or nearby.

Keep up to date with the fashion world by activating PUSH NOTIFICATIONS! You’ll be the first to know when a designer collection drops and you’ll instantly be notified when we have special offers and events!

Don’t miss out — download the H&M app now!

When you download the H&M app, we will process your data in accordance with our Privacy Notice. For more details on this, please go to hm.com.

developer: ALDI International Services GmbH & Co. oHG
description:
